headline.main: HALIFAX SURVEYS WAR TO PRESIDENT; Canvasses Situation in Russia and Middle East as Well as Progress in Britain

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 -- Viscount Halifax, who returned yesterdal from London, conferred with President Roosevelt today on the war situation and the need for accelerating Anglo-American production for quick delivery at the fighting fronts.
abstract: Halifax conf with Roosevelt; urges quick deliveries to fighting fronts
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 -- Viscount Halifax, who returned yesterdal from London, conferred with President Roosevelt today on the war situation and the need for accelerating Anglo-American production for quick delivery at the fighting fronts....
